Name: Swirl Rock
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Special Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Totodile, Croconaw, and Feraligatr.  Swap a Croco-Fang and a Croco-Card for a Swirl Rock at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
